metadata.title: CVE-2024-28835 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw has been discovered in GnuTLS where an application crash can beinduced when attempting to verify a specially crafted .pem bundle using the"certtool --verify-chain" command.

criterions.comment: gnutls28 package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
